description: This file defines the AttendanceProvider class, a state management component for handling attendance data within a Flutter application. It manages loading, updating, and querying attendance records, interfacing with a DatabaseService, and notifies listeners of changes.

classes.name: AttendanceProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based provider managing attendance data, including loading data, marking attendance, updating records, and providing attendance statistics.

methods.name: loadAttendance
methods.description: Loads attendance data for a specific date from the database.

methods.name: markAttendance
methods.description: Marks new attendance for a student and adds it to the local list.

methods.name: updateAttendance
methods.description: Updates an existing attendance record both locally and in the database.

methods.name: getAttendanceForDate
methods.description: Retrieves all attendance records for a particular date.

methods.name: getAttendanceForStudent
methods.description: Fetches the attendance record for a specific student on a specific date.

methods.name: getAttendanceStats
methods.description: Provides statistics of attendance statuses for a specific date.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Sets the loading state and notifies listeners.

methods.name: clearError
methods.description: Clears any error message and notifies listeners.
